description: This component describes line endpoints for 2D lines. It has three columns (start, end, arcCenter). Start/end are indices into vertices_2D for the line endpoint. ArcCenter is the counter-clockwise signed distance from the line center to the arc edge.

indices.description: Array of lines. Columns: start, end, arcCenter. Start/End are 0-based indices into the vertices

data.description: Data stored as a binary blob.

data_type.description: Data type for the columns. 1st column is of type uint64, 2nd is uint64 and 3rd is float64.
